expand_graph

PURPOSE

ADJ: a graph over clusters.

SYNOPSIS

function [newadj, objcount]=expand_graph(adj, zs, type)

DESCRIPTION 

 ADJ: a graph over clusters.
 NEWADJ: a graph over objects and clusters. Created by hanging objects
 off ADJ according to the cluster assignments in ZS

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:
  • makeemptygraph Make a graph with one cluster and no objects.
  • relgraphinit Create initial graph for relational data set DATA by using various

SOURCE CODE 

0001 function [newadj, objcount]=expand_graph(adj, zs, type)
0002 
0003 % ADJ: a graph over clusters.
0004 % NEWADJ: a graph over objects and clusters. Created by hanging objects
0005 % off ADJ according to the cluster assignments in ZS
0006 
0007 
0008 if size(adj,1)~=size(adj,2)
0009     error('expand_graph: adj must be square');
0010   elseif size(adj,1) ~= length(zs)
0011    error('expand_graph: adj inconsistent with zs');
0012 end
0013   
0014   nclust = size(adj,1);
0015   objcount = 0;
0016   for i=1:length(zs)
0017     objcount = objcount + length(zs{i});
0018   end
0019 
0020 newadj = zeros(objcount+nclust);
0021 newadj(objcount+1:objcount+nclust, objcount+1:objcount+nclust)=adj;
0022 
0023 %% hang objects off nodes of adj according to zs (assignments)
0024 for i=1:length(zs)
0025   % now directed
0026   % newadj(zs{i},objcount+i)  = 1;
0027   newadj(objcount+i, zs{i}) = 1;
0028 end
